name: Scat Tools
description:
A Scattergories die and timer with three settings. Free and easy to use, this should be all you need to play the game Scattergories. (Besides pencil, paper, and the categories.)

Free, Ad Supported Version.
Download premium version here: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/scat-tools-premium/id1061440783?ls=1&mt=8

If you like this app or find it useful please take the time to review it!

Scat On!
